channel.title: Sustain74 - ESG & Sustainability News
channel.description: Curated ESG and sustainability news from trusted sources

item.title: Beyond Backup: How BESS Protects Data Centers from Emerging Cyber Threats
item.description: As cyber threats evolve beyond IT to target power systems, modern battery solutions offer data centers a new layer of protection against attacks, writes Andressa Ferraz.

item.title: “Epic” effort needed to hit 2050 nuclear power target, experts say
item.description: Nuclear energy is back in favour as a low-emissions alternative to fossil fuels, but high costs and long build times make a goal to triple capacity by 2050 seem a tall order The post “Epic” effort needed to hit 2050 nuclear power target, experts say appeared first on Climate Home News.

item.description: As AI transforms data centers, the industry revisits a fundamental question: is AC or DC power better suited for tomorrow’s high-density computing needs?

item.title: Sustainability Goals Are Set—So Why Aren’t They Being Met? Closing the IT Operations Gap
item.description: Many companies have set ambitious IT sustainability goals, but progress is lagging. Learn what’s holding teams back and how smarter infrastructure, executive alignment, and lifecycle strategies can help close the gap.

item.title: COP30 president prepares for clash of views on how to respond to NDCs
item.description: With most countries yet to submit new emissions-cutting plans due by the end of next month, Brazil will launch consultations on how to tackle an expected shortfall in ambition The post COP30 president prepares for clash of views on how to respond to NDCs appeared first on Climate Home News.

item.description: The commerce secretary framed potential Intel investment as protecting taxpayer interests while maintaining U.S. semiconductor independence.

item.title: There's much more support for climate action than policymakers think, study finds

item.title: Terabit Connection: Will 6G Finally Cut the Data Center Cable?
item.description: While 6G technology remains in the planning stages, its potential terabit speeds and near-zero latency could revolutionize data center networking by 2030.
